attributes.Content: Homa Pilot Complex was founded in 2020 by pilot Benyamin Amiri. The purpose of this complex is to provide aviation and piloting courses that are available online for free to pilot students and all those who are interested in this industry. At Homa Pilot, an attempt has been made to provide all courses with a high level of educational standard, which will lead to better student learning. In addition, there is an exam at the end of each course for the students to assess what they have learned.

SEO.metaDescription: Homa Pilot was established in 2020 and aims to provide piloting and aviation courses and exams that are available to all for free.
